Text.text: Your guide to a Central Launchpad
Helping you building a central launchpad for your end users by:
I will not only do it for you, I'll be your personal Central Launchpad mentor by:
Training your own Central Launchpad team
A Central Launchpad requires a clear UX strategy that comes with:
Based on hands-on experience I can assist you with your Central Launchpad Governance:
A Central Launchpad will overlap multiple system which requires a seamless single sign-on experience with a secure authorization concept and well organized launchpad:
Depending on the complexity of your landscape and your needs, you have different options to create a Central Launchpad. I've been working with all possible options:
Fiori Launchpad HUB / Standalone Frontend Server
Fiori Launchpad Embedded on your backend

Depending on your Central Launchpad strategy, your Fiori applications will run in BTP or on your S/4HANA system. As a developer, I can build applications in BTP or S/4HANA but I can also help you and your team building applications for your central launchpad connected to any of your SAP Cloud solutions or On-Premise systems for adapting it to your needs using:

BTP offers new type of applications which requires to update the skills of your developer. I can build applications for you but I can also teach and mentor your developers to use the following technologies in BTP:
It is not because the app looks good that the code looks good. Avoid bugs, keep maintenance low and have happy end users by applying the following:
Avoid suprises when going to production with a good DevOps setup in BTP using:
Migrate apps from HUB to Embedded
Migrate apps from NEO to CF
Migrate apps from On-Premise to CF
Update apps to the latest version
